entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 12:29 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
